name: IMMZ.DT.06.Pneumococcal
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Pneumococcal vaccine minimum age 6 weeks old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - No Doses
action.description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 2p+1 schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses and minimum age atleast 6 weeks old "
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because no doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - 1 Dose
action.description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 2p+1 schedule – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = " 1 dose given atleast 8 weeks before and minimum age atleast 6 weeks old "
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 1 dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - No Dose
action.description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 3p+0 schedule – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = " No doses given and minimum age atleast 6 weeks old "
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because No dose

action.description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization 3p+0 schedule – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because 2 doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - No Doses
action.description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = " No doses and aged 1–5 years and HIV+ or has sickle-cell disease "
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because No doses

action.description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "PCV immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Pneumococcal - No Doses
action.description: Provide Pneumococcal immunizations – using the "Catch-up PCV immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description:
"Pneumococcal vaccine immunization history" = " No doses and aged 1-5 years old and particularly in settings with a high
disease burden and mortality "
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Pneumococcal because No doses
